archiefmat.scope: There are four volumes per year, each regarding a period of three months. In a chronological register for each consecutive date all the resolutions are listed and numbered, with a short compilation of their contents. The full text of the resolutions can be found in the second part of the volume. Each resolution was given an 'archival number' which points to the series of resolutions in the protocols. Resolutions regarding the same subject received the same archival number and were bound chronologically together with their attachments.
archiefmat.notes:
The period October-December 1865 is missing. The complete series up to 1950 consists of 752 volumes.

The numbers of the inventory items may be changed (November 2008).
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: NB de nummering kan mogelijk nog wijzigen; het archief wordt op dit moment (november 2008) omgenummerd. Later nazien!
